summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the improvement of S. Juniper St. from 56th Ave. S. and certain other streets, avenues and easements by constructing sanitary sewers therein by local improvement district procedures authorized by Ordinance 107359 creating LID 6700; amending Section 1 of Ordinance 107359 to include improvement of a street newly platted within the geographical confines of said local improvement district.
